title: Inside The Dungeon (Part 2)
body:
Inside The Dungeon (Part 2)

Inside the inferno dungeon, Adam looked around while still maintaining his hand walking position.

The sky of the dungeon was deep red in colour. Scarlet clouds that were looking like they were filled with magma were moving slowly, and some strange small bird like monsters were circling around the scarlet clouds. The ground of the dungeon was cracked and scorched black. From time to time, scarlet steam of smoke was coming out from the cracks in the ground. The temperature inside the dungeon was around one hundred degrees Celsius.

Because of being an A ranker, Adam wasn't bothered by the temperature of the place. He created a gravitational field around him to resolve the issue of high temperature steam that was coming out from the ground.
